name: Shadow Gadget
description: is a passive creature collecting idle game that transforms your Playdate into an online-enabled specter catcher! Take aim at ghosts and suck them into your Playdate using the built-in crank! Keep your tractor beam on target to weaken the ghost and crank for maximum pull! Your precision and reflexes will be put to the ultimate test as you collect ancient and powerful spirits!

name: The Barkless Doctrine
description: After being woken up by a mysterious phone call from her most important relative, Val goes on a journey through the busy streets of NYC, the seedy political underbelly of Washington D.C., and the dark suburbia on the periphery of the American dream. Can the two twin-aunts stop General Wagmore Barkless before it’s too late?

name: Treasure Chasers
description: Treasure Chasers is a pirate-themed game, where you navigate through procedurally-generated islands, picking up cargo and delivering to other ports to sell. Besides the whirlpools, there are also pirates that are out to get you! Either avoid them or shoot them with your cannons to survive as long as you can.

Your fingers will stand to a fight you can't even imagine!

name: Zombie Knockout
description:
There is one game simple enough for every zombie to play: knockout (also known as bump).
Their goal is to score a basket before the player behind them makes a shot. If they make a shot before the player behind them, they must go back behind the line and shoot again.
Players keep shooting until one player scores before the player in front of him/her.
Zombies take their knockout games very seriously.

As the resident milk-tender it’s up to you to pour the perfect glass of milk for your furry friends. Make sure you keep the milk flowing and your whiskery guests purring through jam after jam.

With six radically thrilling events intended to bring you to the edge and blow your mind. And make adrenaline California's most plentiful natural resource.

It has simple and easy-to-understand rules, making it accessible for anyone to play.
Various assist functions are also included, allowing for a smooth gameplay experience.
You can also choose to turn off the assist functions if desired.

name: Metal: Hellsinger - Essential Hits Pack
description: The joy of demon-slaying to the beat exists on a spectrum, and with the Essential Hits Pack, you get the entire rainbow. Shoot to the beat of eight hit songs from bands like Muse, Depeche Mode, and Gorillaz.

name: Only Up!
description: Have you ever wanted to walk through the peaks and have an eagle vision? To fly over the world like a God ! Embark on an exciting journey in Only UP: Rising ! Play as a lost pirate on an island sheltering the ruins of a Lost City in the middle of the Pacific !

description: Clean up the mean streets of River City across three hard-hitting, knuckle-busting beat-'em-ups: River City Girls, River City Girls 2, and River City Girls Zero!

name: Five Nights at Freddy's: Security Breach - Chaos Mod
description: Welcome to the Chaos Mod, chaos in its purest form! This is just pure chaos, there are a total of over 30 random events! Lots of surprises are waiting for you. So are you ready, Gregory?

name: Arco
description:
Three tales forged in bloodshed, laced with magic, and united by revenge.

Enter the breathtakingly beautiful world of Arco, a unique tactical action game where your decisions shape the story. Journey through lush forests, sweeping plains, and scorching deserts as you guide four unlikely heroes in their vendetta against the Red Company gang.

Battle warriors of different nations, fend off greedy colonizers, and slay monstrous creatures as you voyage across this enchanted land. Change your fate, one move at a time.

name: California Games II
description: SNES port of California Games II.

name: Aria
description: Based on the album by CMD094, Aria is an interactive homage to the themes of the original album and classic RPG games from which it took its inspiration. Aria aims to replicate the experience of the classic 2D top-down RPG from the age of floppy discs and humming CRT monitors. Explore the world of Aria from peaceful plains and magical temples to mysterious forests, talk to its residents, defeat enemies, discover its secrets... and most importantly save Aria!

name: California Games II

name: Higurashi no Naku Koro ni: Minagoroshi-hen
description: A port of the remade version of the third arc of Higurashi When They Cry Kai for modern consoles in widescreen.

name: Higurashi no Naku Koro ni: Matsuribayashi-hen
description: A port of the remade version of the fourth and final arc of Higurashi When They Cry Kai for modern consoles in widescreen.

name: Higurashi no Naku Koro ni: Saikoroshi-hen
description: A port of the epilogue to the main story of Higurashi originally included in Rei for modern consoles in widescreen.

name: Sudoku Variants by Logic Wiz
description: Logic Wiz's Free Sudoku Variants is an intellectual sudoku-based feast. The combinations of variants will promote your intelligence, memory, data processing and problem-solving skills to new levels.

name: Higurashi no Naku Koro ni: Taraimawashi-hen
description: A port of the extra arc originally included in Matsuri, which acts as a bad ending when the player does not make choices that would lead them to Onikakushi, Watanagashi, or Tatarigoroshi for modern consoles in widescreen.

name: Grand Theft Auto Online: The Doomsday Heist
description: This update features a new storyline, which begins with the GTA Online Protagonists are reunited by Lester Crest and a new character, billionaire Avon Hertz. The protagonist, Lester, and Avon unite with government agents, including Agent 14 and Phoenicia Rackman. Avon believes that an unknown foreign entity is trying to start a war and would put San Andreas and the United States under a "doomsday scenario". The heist crew is involved in several missions, which introduce new military-grade vehicles and weapons featured within the update.

name: Higurashi no Naku Koro ni: Tsukiotoshi-hen
description: A port of the extra arc originally included in Matsuri that serves as an alternate version of Tatarigoroshi where Keiichi, Shion, and Rena team up to save Satoko from her uncle for modern consoles in widescreen.

name: Higurashi no Naku Koro ni: Someutsushi-hen
description: A port of the extra arc and the first in the Advanced Story saga originally included in Kizuna Volume I, partially adapted from the manga-exclusive arc Onisarashi, for modern consoles in widescreen.

name: Higurashi no Naku Koro ni: Alternative Hirukowashi-hen
description: A port of the alternative version of Hirukowashi-hen originally included in Kizuna Volume II, which contains several changes to its original version in Kai, namely the addition and removal of certain characters and the removal of references to plot details not yet revealed, for modern consoles in widescreen.

name: Higurashi no Naku Koro ni: Kageboushi-hen
description: A port of the extra arc and the second in the Advanced Story saga originally included in Kizuna Volume I, partially adapted from the manga-exclusive arc Onisarashi, for modern consoles in widescreen.

name: Higurashi no Naku Koro ni: Yoigoshi-hen
description: A port of the extra arc included in Kizuna Volume III based on the manga arc of the same name and features several changes, namely the addition of a new character, Miyuki Sorimachi, for modern consoles in widescreen.

name: Higurashi no Naku Koro ni: Tokihogushi-hen
description: A port of the extra arc and the third in the Advanced Story saga that centers on Tomoe Minai investigating a murder case with ties to Rena Ryuugu for modern consoles in widescreen.

name: Space Pizza
description: Satisfy all your space ship punching needs.

name: Higurashi no Naku Koro ni: Kotohogushi-hen
description: An extra arc originally included in Kizuna IV that functions as a prequel to the entire series for modern consoles in widescreen.

name: Disney Infinity 2.0 Spider-Man Playset
description: Sin descripción

name: Qomp2
description:
An artful reimagining of Pong, qomp2 picks up the story where the delightful indie platform-puzzler qomp left off in 2021.

Control a Pong ball aching to break free of its life stuck between two paddles. Explore a dangerous, minimalist world, armed with simple two button controls: tap a button to change direction by 90 degrees, and hold down a button to unleash a cathartic dash forward. That’s all you need to solve environmental puzzles and labyrinthine levels. Around each corner is a new challenge that will test your two-button and problem-solving skills. A variety of difficult enemies and bosses help you mark your time as you navigate through 30 levels spread across four worlds.

A cerebral puzzler lies within the heart of this indie twist on Pong.

name: Overcooked! All You Can Eat : World Food Festival Update
description: Head back to the Onion Kingdom and celebrate World Food Day in this uber-delicious FREE update, OUT NOW on Nintendo Switch, PS4, PS5, Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S and Steam!

name: Manifold
description:
Run. Jump. Bend gravity to your will.

Dizzying heights and insurmountable slopes are no problem with the Gravitational Manifold Anomaly Device.

Don’t get mad, get GMAD!

name: Fold
description:
Run. Jump. Bend gravity to your will.

Dizzying heights and insurmountable slopes are no problem with the Gravitational Manifold Anomaly Device.

This is the full, super-fun-happy version of the game formerly known as Manifold.

name: Higurashi no Naku Koro ni: Miotsukushi-hen Omote
description: A port of the original alternative ending that is included in Matsuri for modern consoles in widescreen.

name: Higurashi no Naku Koro ni: Miotsukushi-hen Ura
description: A port of the additional content included in Kizuna Volume 4's Miotsukushi-hen split into its chapter for modern consoles in widescreen,

name: Higurashi no Naku Koro ni: Hajisarashi-hen
description: An extra arc about Keiichi and the Club going to have fun at a pool that was initially included in Sui but later brought to Hou.

name: Higurashi no Naku Koro ni Hou: Batsukoishi-hen
description: An extra arc initially included as an epilogue to the original PC release of Meakashi, where Keiichi Maebara loses several club games in a row, the Soul Brothers help him regain his will to fight by imagining the other club members in perverted fantasies.

name: Higurashi no Naku Koro ni Hou: Outbreak
description: A remade version of Outbreak that was initially included in the PC release of Hou, with improved graphics and full voice acting.

name: Higurashi no Naku Koro ni Hou: Kamikashimashi-hen
description: A remade version of Outbreak that was initially included in the PC release of Hou, with improved graphics and full voice acting.

name: Higurashi no Naku Koro ni Hou: Hinamizawa Teiryuujo
description: A remade version of Outbreak that was initially included in the PC release of Hou, with improved graphics and full voice acting.

name: Super Mario Bros. 3 Alpha
description: A new level of hack for Super Mario Bros. 3. Like the original, there are up to 8 worlds.

name: Party Bros.
description: Party Bros. is a rom hack for Super Mario Bros. that features new levels, custom music and custom graphics.

name: The Jetsons: Space Race
description: A simple, slick side-scrolling platformer starring The Jetsons, everyone's favorite space age family. George is running late and there's bumper-to-bumper traffic on the intergalactic interstate. But he still has to drop off Elroy at the Little Dipper School, Judy at Orbit City High, Astro at the Galaxy K-9 School, and Jane at the Shopping Center. All before heading to work. Will he make it to Spacely Sprockets on time?

name: The Genesis Order
description: Murder and mystery lead a young detective to investigate a cult and to cross paths with a criminal organization. With the help of an angel and a harem of beauties, take on the challenge of saving the world from a mysterious threat.

name: Dead by Daylight: Alien Chapter Pack
description: Dead by Daylight's Alien Chapter brings two iconic characters into The Fog: new Killer the Xenomorph and new Survivor Ellen Ripley. A new Map, Nostromo Wreckage, is available for all players. This Chapter Pack unlocks the Motion Tracker Charm, as well as the Very Rare Back in Action outfit for Ellen Ripley.

name: 01 Deadliest Zone Catch: Boat Crab & Fishing Simulator
description:
Embark on thrilling maritime adventures where you'll become a professional crab catcher and navigate the treacherous waters of Alaska. Earn a fortune while traveling on a large boat, battling dangerous natural disasters. And don't forget about those menacing crab claws!
Become a true captain. Manage your ship and utilize professional equipment to catch crabs in the vast Bering Sea. Explore the waters of Alaska, study crab migrations, and do everything possible to succeed even in the most turbulent days. Prepare yourself for exciting quests in search of wealth and glory on the open seas!
In "01 Deadliest Zone Catch — Boat Crab & Fishing Simulator" you'll have the opportunity to participate in perilous sea races for the best catch and capture crabs beyond your wildest dreams. Your task won't be easy—you'll have to contend with time constraints, weather conditions, crab migrations, and, most importantly, the unforgiving sea itself. This is your destiny on the waters of Alaska!
It will take all your courage and determination to conquer the deadly waves and build your own fortune in the world of crab catching. Take action and seize the opportunity to become a legend in "01 Deadliest Zone Catch — Boat Crab & Fishing Simulator"!

name: Mystic Gate
description: Take the role of a wanderer and his robotic companion as they travel beyond the gate and attempt to master its secrets! Dash, dodge and take aim at hordes of enemies through procedurally generated dungeons that make every run feel unique. Presented in top-down pixel art style, Mystic Gate is a twin stick shooter that combines RPG elements with bullet hell action! Can you survive, upgrade and overcome the terrors of the gate to realize your ultimate dream?

name: Betomis
description: Explore dark dungeons as a valiant knight and survive using your wits and limited resources!

name: Bomb Up
description:
Bomb Up is a fast-paced one-button game.

You are constantly falling down. Press a button to fire a bomb and press it again to explode it. Score points by destroying all the red squares within the radius of its explosion. The explosion will bounce you up and to the side and you will turn around when you hit a wall.

The game is over when a red square hits you.

name: Capybro
description: Play as a Capybara and be a bro to your forest friends as you make your way to the spa.

name: One Piece Odyssey: Adventure Expansion Pack
description: Sin descripción

name: Welcome to the Endgame
description: Sin descripción

name: ErIS: Z. θ-pRogram
description: ErIS: Z. θ-pRogram is a traditional Yume Nikki fangame. You play as Yuumitsuki and explore a virtual world via a headset.

name: Yoshitsune-ki
description: Yoshitsune-ki is a historical action game released by Banpresto on December 1, 2005 for the PS2 and was Developed by Dream Factory . The game is known for having Popular Manga artist Takeshi Obata in charge of character design. The game takes place in the late Heian period to the early Kamakura period when Minamoto no Yoshitsune was active . While controlling the main character Yoshitsune, he fights monsters and the Heike with his companions, and aims to destroy the Heike by making full use of various swordsmanship in places such as Heiankyo, Hiraizumi , and Dannoura .

name: List 118
description:
When Tsunagu was about to pass through the school building—
Yoru, who was supposed to be holding his hand, suddenly disappeared, and the entrance was blocked.

description: A PC dating sim.

name: Sotsugyou Ryokou
description: A dating sim visual novel.

name: KuruKuru MaruMaru
description: Kurukuru Marumaru is a cartoony driving game where your character is taking driving lessons.

name: Plus Plumb
description: Plus Plumb is a puzzle game for the Sega Dreamcast.

name: Plus Plum 2 Again
description: A competition puzzle game which features three types of falling objects that must be color-matched in groups of three.

name: Hymn to the Earless God
description: Turn-based RPG from the creator of Jimmy and the Pulsating Mass set on a brutal alien planet. Four unique main characters, four unforgettable stories, four inescapable calamities.

name: Shoot For Fun's Sake
description: A short solo shooter game where you shoot fixed sensors and sensor patrols without anything shooting back. Use tactical skills to destroy sensors without exceeding the detection limit.

name: Tiny Touring Cars
description: A fun arcade racing game in a low poly style. Choose from 3 cars and 9 tracks to race against your friends and the AI or try your hand at setting the fastest laps times on the Steam leaderboards.

name: Pixel Puzzles WW2 Jigsaw: Kriegsmarine
description: Pixel Puzzles World War II, merging history with the definitive jigsaw puzzler on the PC platform.

name: Farm Garden Simulator
description: Farm Garden Simulator is a farm simulator game where you can grow a lot of crops and raise animals.

name: Alpine Lake
description: Kick back in the fresh mountain air and craft your ideal haven on the shores of Alpine Lake! Build, and decorate your inn to bring joy and prosperity to the community. Welcome guests to your cozy escape in the woods. Farm, cook, and entertain them in your own unique way!

name: Pixel Puzzles WW2 Jigsaw: French Tanks
description: Pixel Puzzles World War II, merging history with the definitive jigsaw puzzler on the PC platform.

name: Traitorous Trek
description: Welcome to Traitorous Trek ! Immerse yourself in a universe teeming with deception, betrayal, and nail-biting tension. As a member of an interstellar fleet, your mission is to unravel the hidden shadows lurking within, thwart the conspirators' plans, and safeguard the future of humanity.

name: On Life and Living
description: In "On Life and Living", beyond metroidvania-style exploration and challenging encounters, players will also experience an emotional story of love, grief, and consequences. You are in control, shaping the course of this journey towards regeneration.

name: Castle Empire
description: Unleash your strategic prowess

name: Ship Regulus
description: In the first year of the ephemeris, the warp engine was invented. Due to the initial engine being too large, it was installed on the space city Regulus. During engine testing, the jump signal attracted an alien fleet, and the Ship Regulus embarked on a flight path.

name: Car Mechanic: City Driving
description: Customize your own car and go on a serene ride through the city streets!

name: Eternal Vigil
description: Embark on an epic quest to defend the sacred crystal from relentless waves of monstrous invaders.Harness your unique combat skills, strategically deploy your powerful turrets and reach your full potential to push back the dark forces. Will you rise as the ultimate defender or succumb to the shadows?

name: Depthris
description: Depthris is a 3D puzzle game inspired by the classic BlockOut game for DOS. Move and rotate the pieces almost anywhere (except backwards) and aim for the highest score.

name: Humbug Tales: Keeper of the Swarm
description: Experience the world of bugs through the eyes of the humbug ant herder Eacus and his peculiar flock. Together you'll meet a quirky cast of tiny friends on a larger-than-life adventure. Explore lush wetlands and use your wits to outsmart predators and enemy humbugs. Your colony is depending on you!

name: Latmos Explorer
description: Discover the mysteries of Latmos with block coding. Learn about the cultural heritage and history of humanity while preparing for the future.

name: Block & Shot
description: Block & Shot will immerse you in the captivating world of logical puzzles, where you will have to control various weapons to overcome obstacles in your path and reach the main goal - the golden cartridge

name: Anvil of Tristheim
description: The first card-based blacksmith crafting game! Merge material cards into items - and turn your customers into dragon slayers or dragon food.

name: Ultramassive
description: Embark on a journey towards the center of the galaxy in Ultramassive, a roguelite deckbuilder! Craft a unique deck, fight hostile aliens, gamble your way out of stick situations and and find parts to upgrade your spaceship along the way.

name: After the Storm
description: Rebuild society after the climate apocalypse! Can you keep your settlement alive? Will you hold onto your humanity or lose it in the directionless expanse?

name: After University
description: As a desperate unemployed university graduate, your dreams seem distant until fate guides you to your uncle's worn-out doner restaurant in a new city. Dive into a world where gangsters lurk, and true love Amy reappears. Your goals are clear: Achieve Career Success, Get Married, and Earn Respect.

name: Cosmos: Stella Returns
description: Cosmos: Stella Returns is a metroidvania that will bring you to the mysterious planet of Memoria. Shoot, jump, collect materials and new items in this action-platform with a vintage flavor!

name: The Left Behind
description: The Left Behind is a solo and co-op post-apocalyptic survival game. Explore an overgrown open world at day time and beware of enemies coming in at night. Salvage, hunt and build your way through this world to survive. How long will you survive?

name: Custom Mech Wars
description:
Take customization to the extreme with the Omega Customization System and battle with one-of-a-kind combat units in this all-new third-person shooter mecha game.

Not being restricted to bipedal builds, you can freely customize your mechs to include multiple heads, legs, and arms in whatever positions and angles you choose. Depending on the parts you use, the parameters will vary wildly, so you can build mechs with whatever abilities and fighting styles you wish!

Arm your custom mech to the teeth with every weapon imaginable and blast your way through oncoming enemies. Experience the heart-pounding mecha action that only your Omega Customized units can provide. Destroy enemy units, collect their parts, and customize your favorite mechs even more. Complete a variety of missions as you battle, customize, and then battle and customize some more!

This game supports online multiplayer. Up to four players can cooperate to complete story missions just like in single-player mode. Not only can you experience the rush of tackling missions with friends, but you can show off your favorite mechs you personally customized.

name: Hotel Clover
description: Here, there exists a secretive guest only known to me. A fusion of romance and management simulation, 'Hotel Clover'.

name: Garlic Builder
description: Garlic Builder is a unique building game. As the new builder of the Garlic Family, can you inherit your father's building hammer, take various orders, follow the blueprint, or use your imagination to fulfill the strange needs of your customers?

name: Wonder Wandelier
description: You're an apprentice wand maker with a dream - and a huge debt to pay off in 30 days! Manage your store, gather materials in the dungeon, and craft magic wands to sell to customers. Haggle to get the best price and build reputation as a wand maker in this casual magic wand-shop simulation RPG.

name: Monster Home
description: This is a top down RPG. A girl named Aliosha. She inherited the bloodline of the strongest summoner and the monster farm left by her father. This game can collect various monsters, manage farms, and explore unknown worlds.

name: HostageHub
description: Team up with friends in HostageHub, the ultimate wave-based hostage rescue experience. Fight, earn, spend, and repeat. Can you master the art of hostage rescue and financial balance?

name: Cold Verdict 2
description: A direct sequel to 'Cold Verdict'. Another group of people wake up in a strange abandoned location, trying to find a way out and understand why they were put there. What is the killer's endgame in all this? A short interactive story with choices.

name: The Tale of Lumi
description: Master tight platforming sections, collect and upgrade Godly powerups, battle powerful enemies, solve intriguing puzzles and explore the riveting world of LUMI in this fast paced 2D action game

name: Shape Quiz
description: -Shape Quiz- is a knowledge game with guessing elements.

name: Soul of War: Legions
description: "SoulofWar" is a strategy deck-building game with twists. It features 8-player PvP battles where you strategically outplay your opponents. It introduces a fresh auto chess gameplay.

name: Let's Play! Oink Games: Kobayakawa
description: Simple...or is it? An easy to learn card game full of bluffing and bravery. The "Kobayakawa" card is the key to victory!

name: Parcel Packing Simulator
description: A Cozy parcel-packing game where you use your brains to Pack parcels in as small packages as possible! Pack random orders to train yourself and try to break high scores from the order list!

name: Bloody Heaven
description: In Bloody Heaven, players will challenge to use various of weapons with different features to beat enemy waves.

name: Nellie's Nonograms
description: A collection of nonograms made by friends and fans of the vtuber NellieAndGrits!

name: Backrooms: Run For Your Life!
description: This is a Backrooms game created by fans. In this game, the main experience is the "Level!" in Backroom(or "Run For Your Life").

name: Arcade Galaxy
description: Welcome to Arcade Galaxy! Race with cube-animals on obstacle-filled tracks. Use skills like lightning strikes and super jumps to gain an edge. Customize your Cub's look and abilities for a unique racing. Create your own tracks with our advanced editor. Unleash your racing dreams in our galaxy!

name: Warzoom
description: Warzoom A Game Of Dynamic Strategy is a fantastic game that's easy to learn and loads of fun to play! It's a tit-for-tat with no two games ever alike. Non stop action from the beginning to the end. Prepare for battle!

name: Space Battle Royale
description: Calling all space pilots! Fight your way to the final showdown inside the mysterious Cube, unleashing havoc and leaving only the debris of the rival ships behind. Oh, did you find yourself left among the wreckage? Upgrade your attributes, modify your ship – and get back into the carnage!

name: Slime Volley
description: Step into the bouncy and exciting arcade game of Slime Volley! This isn't your typical volleyball game – it's an arcade sensation that takes the classic sport and gives it a bouncy, slimy twist. Prepare for a thrilling multiplayer showdown as you leap onto the court for some fast-paced action.

name: Legends of Savvarah: Time of Pariah
description: A fantasy interactive tale about the beast-man Hidu investigating murders in a port city.

name: Fomography
description: Fomography is a story-driven adventure photography game. Play as a boy exploring his entire lifetime to rediscover and chronicle his memories. What has been forgotten that only the photos can show? What hidden memories do even the photos refuse to share?

name: Humankind: Cultures of Oceania Pack
description: The Humankind Cultures of Oceania DLC includes:- 6 New Cultures - 6 New Wonders - 7 Independent Peoples - 15 Narrative Events - New in-game themed music tracks composed by Arnaud Roy

name: Pixel Puzzles WW2 Jigsaw: Italian Tanks
description: Pixel Puzzles World War II, merging history with the definitive jigsaw puzzler on the PC platform.

name: Silent Paws: Hidden Valley
description: Embark on a tranquil journey through the mesmerizing landscapes of the Hidden Valley as you take on the role of a graceful fox in this enchanting walking simulator.

name: Grandma's Kitchen
description: Cook up fun and learning in Grandma's Kitchen! Bake together some compound words, snatch healthy veggies hiding in the fridge, and use ingredients to make and decorate a cake. This dancing Grandma needs you to spot the differences between the desserts, count by tens to tally the cookies, and choose the clock that shows when your cake will be done. Plus, watch videos of real-live cooking action alongside dear ol' Grandma!

name: The Pocket Arcade
description:
Enter into the golden age of arcade gaming with The Pocket Arcade. Play the biggest collection of amazingly detailed and crafted retro arcade games anywhere you want.
The Pocket Arcade is a love letter to arcade games from a bygone era, where neon-soaked, coin-operated machines were the pinnacle of interactive entertainment. From early 8-bit shooters and monochrome vector games through 16-bit puzzlers and action games, right up to early 3D games from the mid-'90s, as well as non-videogame coin-ops such as darts, pool, and table football. The Pocket Arcade is a gamer’s paradise!

name: Project K1
description: Follow Rion Karmanz`s legend to become the first human Raja Rimba in this fast paced hack-n-slash action game that is inspired by Megaman and Devil May Cry series.

name: Snakes LTD VR
description: Casual Snakes Combat. Kill other snakes and grow as much as you can.

name: Tiny Pharaoh: Pixel Strategy
description: Tiny Pharaoh is a real-time strategy game set in Ancient Egypt. Become the master builder and turn the meadow into a city with a functional economy. Build houses, farms, mines, sawmills, and much more. Accumulate resources and achieve significant goals, such as building pyramids, the Great Sphinx, and many other famous buildings!

name: Election Year Knockout: Boxing
description: Create your own political party, lace up your boxing gloves, and punch your way to the White House in Election Year Knockout! In a country torn apart by its political divide, the nation has resorted to boxing to settle its differences. Fight your way through hilarious political opponents before squaring off with president Donald Thump himself!

name: Dinosaur Assassin: I-Evolution
description:
​On your Dinosaur Assassin journey you’ll require a host of weapons and a variety of ways to travel through this dangerous world.
You can build up your weapons to include: Pistol Crossbow(Explosive Arrows), Compound Bow, Proximity Mines/Gas Canisters, Handgun, Rifle.

name: Shopping Match
description:
Looking for a different type of memory match game? Well look no further.
Welcome to Shopping Match by Deanavryn Studios.
Shopping Match is a memory match game with a difference.
First you need to select grocery items to place on your shopping list. Once your list is complete it’s time to go shopping.
Each player needs to find all the items on their shopping list by turning over cards one at a time. Make a match, pick again! No match, the card turns back over.
The first player to find all their grocery items wins.
You can choose from 16, 24 or 36 cards.
You can play with one or two players.
Happy Shopping!
All Deanavryn Studio Apps are child friendly.

name: DoudingMan
description: This is a defensive shooter Roguelite game where enemies will be coming from the right side in an endless stream and you need to survive for a limited time to get through. If you can keep the goods on the left intact, all the better.

name: Bananarang: The Scattered Shards
description: The coolest, weirdest, wackiest and most fun 2D platforming game you'll ever play!

name: A Dragon's Tale: Fading Light
description: Embark on a journey as a small dragon across enchanting worlds, find runes with arcane powers and learn many powerful abilities. Master them to solve puzzles, defeat mighty enemies and eventually face the Black Dragon in this unique action-platformer!

name: Glassbreakers: Champions of Moss
description: Lead your squad of Champions into an immersive arena in this exciting game of tactics, magic, and power! This 1v1 real-time battler puts you face to face with your opponent and their squad for action-packed gameplay that will keep you coming back for more.

name: Death Life: Beyond Purgatory
description: Humanity has lost its war against the virus, a world where balance and order have been disrupted. A unit unaffected by the virus, dedicated to aiding humanity, has emerged. A courier whose path leads to New State. Will you be able to complete the delivery in the face of the challenges ahead?

name: Harrowed World: Portents In Red
description: Get ready to unleash your inner vampire! Harrowed World: Portents In Red is a single player RPG video game. As a newly turned vampire, you'll discover the intricate web of power struggles and deadly rivalries that govern vampire society, where danger is everywhere, and trust is a rare commodity.

name: Battle Records of Rota
description: Battle Records of Rota is a straightforward action shooting RPG game, mainly for players who like anime and action shooting games. Players will play Luota, a girl warrior, to help the little prince defeat the witch and regain the throne.

name: Benefitship
description: Experience the rapidly increasing sexual tension in the blossoming "friendship" between a futanari and her new roommate. A short and fun friends-with-benefits visual novel.

name: Shapeguard
description: Shapeguard is a 2D top-down interactivity driven puzzle game where you move on a grid, inside a temple, and collect different shapes to solve puzzles. Will you manage to use the machines, walls and doors to your advantage to escape from the temple?

name: Marcella Moon: Killer at the Cove
description: Play as amateur sleuth Marcella Moon to investigate a murder in a coastal California town.

name: Spleef Game
description: Dig the blocks below the opposing player to make him fall... But don't fall yourself! As competitive as fun!

name: Sushi Soul Universe
description: Sushi eating 3D action game! An epic love story with a sushi theme! ……sushi! It's too delicious!

name: Only Straight and Up!
description: This is a fun and hardcore roguelike platformer for 1-5 players in which you have to reach the coveted reward by overcoming various traps! Only a few can make it through...

name: Mission: Space
description: After the Earth exploded, the fate of the Earth is in your hands. By creatively building your own spaceship, you'll fight your way through space against pirates. On your journey you will meet many different life forms, some with good, others with bad intentions.

name: The Keyboard
description: This is a text based game. You need to use the given keyboard to achieve the level goal.

name: Infinite Borders
description: With over 10 million downloads, Infinite Borders is a popular strategy game set in China's Three Kingdoms period. Fight alongside legendary heroes to conquer lands and defeat enemies. Build unique teams, guide your city to prosperity, and make special policies. Infinite Borders is calling you!

name: Order Us!
description: Stay for a spell in an alluring café, where orders hold a deeper flavor than meets the eye, and waitresses serve more than just drinks! Find out what goes on under the table in this vintage-inspired visual novel brought to life with Live2D animation!

name: Lust Kingdom
description: Lust Kingdom is a free-to-play hentai RPG with dating sim elements, in which you become the heir to a kingdom! Build relationships, have sex with concubines, gather your army, and conquer new lands to make the Lust Kingdom great again!

name: Alter
description: Humanity is almost extinct and only one fortress remain : Bastion. Defended since centuries by mutated humans called Alter, it may not withstand the upcoming internal and external threats. Help Mavenna change this corrupted society for something better... or worst, it's up to you.

name: Tiny Candy Guardian
description: A cute and exciting VR shooting game. Become a wizard guarding Candy Island, use candy magic to feed various mouthy fantasy creatures and repel them all.

name: Follow the Leader
description: You live in a world where men called barons have all the power, and you were raised as a servant for one until earning enough to buy your freedom, but that freedom is jeopardized when witnessing the baron's abuse of his lab-grown harem of perfect women because they refuse to sleep with him.

name: Zone Trip
description: Dance like you are the music, like the world is your dancefloor and you are the world. Become a VR creator by making your own "zones", make content by recording the awesome visuals that you shake out to the beat, or just enjoy the best of the best.

name: Sun Breed
description: Life;s been tough for you as a half-vampire with your human mother and vampire father being killed when you’re still young. The tragic incident has brought you closer to your sisters, but your lives are uprooted again when vampires and humans start coming up dead. The same way your parents died.

name: Kingdom's Gambit
description: Immerse yourself in the captivating narrative of Kingdom's Gambit an enthralling turn-based puzzle RPG that plunges you into a meticulously crafted levels. Lead a band of heroes in an epic journey of strategic battles and intricate puzzles.

name: Flupp the Fish
description: Play the three Adventures of Flupp, a tiny fish!

name: Roxy Raccoon's Pinball Panic: Workplace Worries
description: 2 Brand New Tables with online leaderboards and unlockable cosmetics! Relieve your stress by tearing up the workplace in these office themed tables!

name: Afterlife
description: Be the main character, and show your strategy to protect the village by stopping monsters attacking it in the afterlife and to get back to where you were.

name: Descend
description: Descend is a VR multiplayer shooter set in a vast Cyberpunk universe. Use special abilities with unique skins, manual reloading features, an extensive loadout system and a collection of unique weapons to secure the objective!

name: Secret Agent
description: The family of our protagonist -- Mikage Jin -- are descendants of a line of ninjas responsible for national security since the Edo era. Jin was born and raised to follow in the footsteps of his secret agent mother as a ninja in training. He's been ordered to infiltrate Touka Academy undercover...

name: Mistery
description:
Mistery is a multiplayer game of survival and social deduction. You work with others to collect materials, survive the dangers, and complete tasks. Beware of monsters, but more of the Alternates disguising as your teammates. They can change into supernatural monsters and attack you at any time.

The game seamlessly blends survival, top-down combat, social deduction, and new weird stories into a unique and visually striking experience, strengthed by a proximity chat system. Join forces with friends to destroy some friendships in Mistery!

name: The Dark Tower
description: Complete the Trials of Kornath and learn the location of the dark evil behind the events that unfurled in The Curse of Feldar Vale and Mystery at Morgoth. An adventure for 4-6 characters of Level 6-12, loosely based on D&D Open Game License (1e/2e).

name: Your Lucky Charm
description: Your Lucky Charm is a yuri comedy dating sim about finding luck (and love) in unexpected places.

name: The Good, the Bad, and the Horsey
description: Brittney hates her podunk, horse-crazy town almost as much as she hates horses themselves... but, with the town's traditional Silver Lasso Run only a month away, can she take this chance to finally grab the reins of her own destiny? Bounced between a good ol' Southern cowgal on the hunt for a dangerous criminal, a mysterious magical drifter with a dark secret, and a rogue centaur who lives by her own rules, Brittney is thrust into a fantastical alternate Wild West world... and has to choose between The Good, The Bad, and The Horsey!!

name: Evilmun Family 1.3.1 Water Update
description: Big - big water update in Evilmun! Now water is available in the Evilmun arena, which will add variety to the gameplay of the game! Drag and drop boxes in the water? See you in the online arena with water!

name: Evilmun Family 2.0
description: The game series is 3 years old, which means a global update for the entire series. New UI menu and new levels for both online and offline. Create your own levels with new tools. Good luck

name: Dead Flamingo
description: Dead Flamingo is an action-adventure fantasy game that follows the epic story of a young fisherman driven by hopeful ideals in an insidious world that meets its end every seven days.

name: Boosted
description: This work is equipped with a "lead walk system" in which the story develops according to the passage of time and the distance traveled! The real world and the game work together to solve mysteries by waiting for time to pass, moving with your character, and making important choices. Aim to clear the game by squeezing the functions and wisdom of Apple Watch!

name: Exit Veil
description:
In Exit Veil, players are cast in the role of Tori, a lost soul navigating her way through a beautiful and terrible world on the brink of decay.
Collect tarot cards and use them in tense MMO healer class-inspired turn-based battles, where you are always moments away from oblivion. Forever on the back foot you’ll have to test your resolve to snatch victory from the jaws of certain defeat.

name: Shinobi Slash
description: Tap, slash, run and ring! Shinobi Slash is an exhilarating new style Japanese style rhythm game with a slashing motif! In addition to original Japanese-style songs, famous sound game songs.

name: Kamiji
description: Kamiji is a Japanese-learning AR trading card game that finds magic in the mundane! Following a volcanic eruption the creatures known as Kami were propelled out of the earth. They were lost and had no homes... But fortunately the ancient humans of China and Japan had hoped and anticipated that they would come home. And forged their entire writing system of the image of the Kami, knowing that one day they would have domains to return to. So the Kami finding these shrine-like remembrances of themselves buried themselves within the kanji. They might've gone completely unnoticed had it not been for a team of scientists who developed a new technology in the form of an app, called Kamiji. Players can use it to scan kanji characters on outdoor billboards that were covered in volcanic ash of the eruption to capture and tame the Kami living within each kanji character.

name: Immune Simulator
description: Immune Simulator is a strategy-adventure game.

name: Growers
description: Growers is a chaotic platformer multiplayer PvP game in which players compete with each other to reach the light on a dark map, to transform into a monster and devour the others. The game has full 4 controller support and is local multiplayer only , though you can use parsec to play online with your friends.

name: Awakening
description: Awakening is a first person experimental puzzle game with a unique gameplay based on pattern recognition. Guide a soul that decided to find meaning by solving puzzle machines with videos. Use inductive reasoning to discover the challenges while exploring an oneiric environment.

name: Fake Emperors
description: This game has more than 5 heroes and you switch between them. A comic story in a classic animation style. With more than 8000 hand-drawing animation frames. An adventure point & click game with many cut-scene animations. If you like cartoons nostalgia this is for you.

name: One Perfect Day
description:
One Perfect Day is a game that explores the topics of abuse and self-compassion. Encompassed in a first person puzzle adventure where players attempt to escape a time loop by solving non-linears puzzles in separate time periods with the use of chronological sequencing itself.

Explore Andy's alma matter and make use of a series of tools and memorabilia to help Andy discover the things that happened or could have happened and help him find his way to the truth of his past.

name: StickSpinner
description: "Challenging Action" meets "Party Game" for up to four players! Introducing our latest game where players navigate using rotating sticks and control their jumps based on stick angles. The unique feature that sets this game apart is the "Jump" mechanic, which also presents its greatest challenge.

name: Tic Tac Toe: Speed Tapping
description:
Tic-tac-toe in a game of speed!
The one with the fastest tap and the smartest brain wins!

name: Cards of Destiny
description: Cards of Destiny is a VR puzzle game that brings the tabletop experience to a unique interactive environment! Turn your inner child into a god as you draw one-time-use cards that can save or condemn the tiny humans on your desk – and the aliens chasing them. Adapt to different levels and situations as your randomized deck, ticking clock and looming alien threats all keep you on your feet!

name: Fistagon
description:
Compete in the futuristic Fistagon-tournament against the best atheletes in the world!
Play in multiplayer to crush other fisters around the world or in single player to top the global leaderboards. Fistagon is a game that's easy to learn, but hard to master.

name: Zombie Rollerz: The Last Ship
description: The Last Ship Take command of the last ship in a zombie-filled world and defend against endless waves of the undead. Build turrets, lead your crew, and upgrade the ship while gathering loot in this exciting "Tower Defense-on-wheels zombie survival roguelite" game.

name: Lost Judgment: Detective Essentials Pack
description:
A DLC pack containing items to enhance the story and side content in the game.

The Detective Essentials Pack contains:

The following additional girlfriends:
•Tsukino Satome, a familiar graphic designer
•Minato Todo, the girl inside the mascot
•Kyoko Hakase, the school nurse

A set of the following six extract recipes and a sample of each extract for single use:
•Extract Recipe: Lightning Blade
•Extract Recipe: Telekinesis
•Extract Recipe: Insta-Flux
•Extra Recipe: Unyielding Wave
•Extract Recipe: Guardian Spirit
•Extract Recipe: Temporal Zen

The following three distinct types of fur varieties for the detective dog:
•White
•Black
•Rust

The following four additional Sega Master System titles
•Fantasy Zone II: The Tears of Opa-Opa
•Global Defense
•SAGAIA / Darius II
•Alien Syndrome

Additional skateboarding pursuits, including:
•Skateboard "Hover Drive"
•Skateboard park "Open Air"

An additional skin for the drone racing minigame:
•Drone frame "Sky Spider"

A challenging super boss for the Gauntlet
•Super Shin Amon

name: Dream Adventure
description: An idle RPG that takes place when you sleep.

name: Dive On
description: Dive On is an Action game, developed and published by Min, which was released in Japan in 1993.

name: Zugya
description: Zugya is an Action Shoot-'em-up game, developed and published by Sprite, which was released in Japan in 1996.

name: Lost Judgment: School Stories Expansion Pack
description:
This pack includes activities to deepen the interactions with the school’s clubs.

Additionally, Yagami takes boxing from the ring to the streets as a new fighting style that joins his default martial arts styles.

The School Stories Expansion Pack contains:

Dance Club additions:
•Additional Special Moves
•New Outfit

An additional robot for the robot war minigame:
•Additional Robot: [MB5000/SUPREMACY]

The following items expand the game of School Stories "Bikers":
•The body of the motorcycle [MAXINATOR]
•Additional Course [Urban]

Adds the following sparring partners to the Boxing Gym:
•Sugiura
•Higashi
•Kaito

A new fighting style for Yagami:
•Boxing Battle Style

name: Sleep: H Now
description: A game in which you can learn Linux commands while playing around.

name: Hokkaido: 4,500km
description: A train game where you set out to travel all over Hokkaido in the 1960s.

name: Gangstar: Crime City
description: Gangstar: Crime City is an open-world action-adventure video game published by Gameloft and developed by at least one of its subsidiaries; it is the first installment in the Gangstar series, was released in October 2006 for button-operated mobile phones, and is set in Crime City.

name: Day of the Toys
description:
80s horror movie mod. Find your son and escape a murderous toy holocaust.

The toys are relentless. Blast ’em, maim ’em, and set ’em ablaze!

name: Blood Rush
description: Blood Rush is a fast paced roguelite skill based fps, upgrade yourself, get new abilities, get new guns, upgrade them and find synergies to destroy anyone or anything standing on your way to escape a Dante inspired Hell!

name: Enraged Red Ogre
description:
In a faraway land, the yokai are suddenly rising and running out of control. A small human village is in danger, but Akaoni, a short-tempered red ogre that lives in it, is going on a rampage to defeat the yokai!

Run, jump and BASH as you travel around a mystique land based on old Japan eras with beautiful pixelart, exploring 9 different zones searching for relics that change the world around you with new paths.

name: Galactic Storm
description: Galactic Storm is a chase-view shooter in the same vain as Galaxy Force or Taito's own Night Striker. The player controls a spaceship equipped with a shield to withstand multiple hits, in addition to the standard shot there is a also a more effective special weapon in limited supply available. After taking off, the player flies on a predetermined course with some limited maneuvering room through the stages, facing of against waves of enemies (giant robots for example). At the end of a level, a stronger boss enemy awaits. Once this obstacle has been defeated, the ship's shields get recovered to some extent and the player can continue the flight through various environments, including for example the wide-openness of space, planetscapes covered with trees, and narrow tunnels.

name: Blood Golf
description: Blood Golf is a PVP or PVE golf-em-up where your target is the other player. Use powerups, map knowledge, and, most importantly, elegant combat-golf technique to turn your enemies into a fine mist or send them past the stratosphere. Has local multiplayer, or you can fight against the CPU.

name: Mission Impossible III
description: You will be thrown in the epicentre of grasping spirit actions of this new film. Operating superspy Ethan Hunt, you should meet the most dangerous terrorist Owen Devian and his numerous soldiers. These people do not know dangers and will not stop before anything for the sake of their mean purpose.

name: Golf Tour
description: Golf Tour is a full-featured 3D golf simulation featuring and entertaining single mode. Golf Tour 3D delivers all the elements of a golf game you would expect including a customizable set of golf clubs, a range of match and stroke play competitions, male and female golfer graphics and a range of golfer abilities.

name: Alibaba and the Scary Dev
description: This game is the mobile response from Qplaze to all 'Alladins' and various 'Princes'. It's a thrilling adventure story of the famous Ali-Baba on your mobile phone. Our main hero - Alibaba is not a naive and good at heart, as Alladin, it's quite the contrary. He is guileful and artful Arabian thief. He is ready for all shocks and scrapes, he is agile and strong. When his sweetheart get kidnapped, he sets out in search of her immediately, without thinking of any danger and obstacles, enemies and monsters, smashing all and every on his way. And the kidnapper is the scary Dev, who still does not know about the trouble he is already in. To get to the Dev's castle, Ali-Baba will have to cross the town, get through deserted blocks, to get the magic carpet and to fly on it over the great desert. Ali-Baba will have to use all his knowledges and skills, which he has obtained being an Arabian thief.

name: Lucky Dog 1 + Bad Egg
description: Lucky Dog 1 + Bad Egg is both an "alternate reality" focusing on Gian x Bakshii and a fandisc of the original Luckydog1. The main game of Bad Egg focuses on Gian x Bakshii, whilst players can also read the after stories of Bernardo, Giulio, Ivan and Luchino that are set after their respective good endings from the first game.

name: Baby's Day Out
description: Sin descripción

name: Celebrity Kombat
description: Celebrity Kombat offers you a unique chance to fight as or against your favorite (or not) personality. With a diverse roster of characters, each with special abilities, prepare to battle in arenas filled with flair, humor, and audacity. Are you ready to settle the score? Join the ultimate showdown!

name: Host no Abunai Sekai
description:
"Host no Abunai Sekai" is a management simulation where you become the owner of a host club run by handsome guys in a night town.
However, it is not normal. A parade of ultra-black scams!
You can sell cheap sweets and drinks that you can buy at 100 yen at a high price & charge infinitely more than the regular price!

name: DoDonPachi Unlimited
description: Dodonpachi Unlimited was a short-lived free-to-play mobile shooter. While it adapted characters, art and music loosely from Dodonpachi Sai-Dai-Ou-Jou, its gameplay had little in common with other games in the series. It lacks the core combo and scoring mechanics from the core Dodonpachi series, instead opting for a very basic set of shooting mechanics. Like many of Mobirix's other shooters, the base game is free to play but players are able to play for single-use powerups, and the game is balanced to be difficult to play without using them.

name: Pokémon Little Cup Red
description: Pokémon Little Cup Red is a Pokémon Red ROM hack that reduces all Pokémon’s levels to 5 and brings them down to the lowest evolution. Any Pokémon that do not evolve have been changed.

name: Project Colored Mountains
description: Project Colored Mountains is a 3D platformer game about a tiny little robot bouncing around a field (and a school, and a comically large grocery store...). Leap through a simulation and into real life while upgrading your abilities as well as defying the laws of physics. We really don't understand how this thing can bounce, stretch out and then jump again in midair. Also, you can roll around or something. Discover what those funny looking block things do, what those other funny block things do, and what those transparent funny block things do.

name: Samba de Amigo: Party-To-Go
description: Join Amigo and his friends in an all-new Samba de Amigo that takes the party wherever you go!

name: Cirno's Lost Chirumiru
description: Cirno was chilling with her Chirumiru, after drinking one, she goes to grab another and she realizes they are all gone. She takes it upon herself to get all her Chirumiru back and to find out who stole them.

name: GNU Sudoku 64
description: GNU Sudoku 64 is a public domain Commodore 64 version of the classic puzzle game Sudoku.

name: Sudoku Kingdom
description: Sudoku Kingdom is a free to play browser version of Sudoku.

name: Sudoku Master
description: Endless number of sudoku puzzles to explore. Sudoku Master - Classic Sudoku has different sudoku puzzles and comes in four difficulty levels: easy, medium, hard sudoku and sudoku expert levels. Sudoku kingdom for all kinds of sudoku players!

name: Pauli's Adventure Island
description: Hop, dash, fly, and float your way through rolling hills, mysterious forests, dark caves, ancient temples, and more in this epic 2D side-scrolling platformer! Explore and collect all the stars in each level for extra lives, but beware of dangerous creatures: One false step, and you’ll get knocked back to square one!

name: Resident Fear: Redistribution
description: Step into the heart of fear in 'Resident Fear: Redistribution.' Survive the undead, solve puzzles, and unveil the sinister in this gripping horror adventure by Gamesoft Studio. Dare to play?

name: Oil Filling
description: Your job is to refuel and manage gas stations. One day, a zombie apocalypse happened. Zombies are coming, you have to deal with this!

name: Ocean Protector
description: Ocean Protector is a free online educational game that teaches students about the impacts of ocean acidification and how they can take action to prevent it.

name: Nemo is going to School
description: Our main character, Nemo, goes to school. He goes up and up, which is 351m above the sky. There's nothing else to do if you fall. Just to not be late, he have to go up without a break! There are dangerous things above. You have to hold back even if you're angry. Now, head to school!

name: Aatral
description: In ancient India, King Vallaan ventures to an infected Eng Empire to rescue his queen, Alli. Evil powers and creatures control the land. Can Vallaan overcome the darkness and save his beloved, or will they both succumb to the sinister forces?

name: Agriculture Tractor Sim
description: Immerse yourself in the captivating realm of agriculture with "Agriculture Tractor Sim"

name: Fall of the Son
description: Fall Of The Son is a roguelike deckbuilder. Assemble powerful strategies to battle through hordes of enemies - with 3 playable characters and over 200 unique cards at your disposal. Do you have the grit and determination to make it to the end and face off against The Son?

name: Getting out Alive
description: A FPS modern time game.

name: Good Fruit
description: This is a simple casual game. The main content is to cut off various fruits that constantly pop up on the screen, which requires players to move quickly and accurately. Once the bomb is cut, the game ends.

name: Gulf Echoes: Tent of Treason
description: Embark on a co-op puzzle journey rooted in the Arab gulf region. Grab a friend and unravel tales from the past. You and your partner must bridge time, sharing clues to unveil hidden truths. Solve intricate puzzles from the present to the past.

name: Captain Kalani: Definitive Edition
description: Control the captain after receiving a distress call from the biggest Factory of robots of the world. Discover the utopian world that hide a big mystery, and find out who are the Robot's Syndicate behind the truoubles.

name: Juicy Ass
description: Juicy Ass is the simplest 2D puzzle the final goal of which to give you pleasure!

name: Mars Training Camp VR
description: Mars training camp realistic VR simulation based on current Mars mission plans. Includes SpaceX Starship, rover, astronauts, robot dog medic, food gardens, and events of fire, rescue teammates, build launch pad, fix equipment and collect rock samples to find evidence of Mars life.

name: Trainz Plus: Trainz Model Railroad - The Chuck Ewe Pharlie Railroad
description: The Chuck, Ewe & Pharlie Railroad serves a diverse range of industries and factories in the Smoke Stack industrial regions. These include a steel mill, timber wharf, dry sort yard and more. Two locomotive depots support both steam and diesel locomotives. Five sessions are included.

name: Bus Simulator 21: Next Stop - Official School Bus Extension
description: Attention all Angel Shores and Seaside Valley bus drivers! It's time to get back into the driver's seat and take on a new challenge as the new school year approaches. Transport your town's kids to their schools safely and in time for their lessons!

name: Kart Crazy Race Simulator Game
description: Fast and dynamic kart races, if you are craving it and looking for it, Kart Crazy Race Simulator will not make you bored.

name: Douyara Builder wo Yatteiru Oshi no V ni ha Watashi no Comment ga Hitsuyou-rashii-ken
description: A game in which you can play with your favorite V-tubers!

name: Eurydice Exhumed
description: orpheus descends into the underworld to retrieve his beloved. made for single choice jam.

name: Equinox
description: Equinox is a limit removing 13-level mapset for Doom II created by B.P.R.D in 2001. It is listed as one of the Top 100 WADs of All Time by Doomworld. Equinox is known for its large scale architecture, which had a tendency to crash some source ports at the time of its release.

name: Memory: Unlocked
description: Memory: Unlocked is a short visual novel made for Velox Fabula 2023, a ranked jam about crafting a complete visual novel in 10 days, based on a community-determined theme.

name: Snow Angel
description:
"What if when you wished for something, someone answered?"

Snow Angel is a heart-warming love story between a human and an angel involving fluff, baking and falling snow. Pick your own pronouns and experience a charming tale within the alps.

name: Pokemon Daycare
description:
Pokémon Daycare was a submission for Relic Castle's Game Jam. Now that the Jam has officially ended, it gets posted to PokeCommunity!
Basically, you own a daycare, where trainers can drop off and pick up their Pokémon. Use the money you get to buy food for the checked in Pokémon or even upgrade the daycare itself. Sometimes you find eggs, which Trainers can adopt, but you never do find out where they come from.
Not really much of a plot to be honest. Trainers are random though, that's cool.

name: Monster Bark
description:
Bark the dog has been robbed by monsters. Monsters were always jealous about the great friends and sweet stuff Bark had, so they planned to steal it all from him in the middle of the night. Little do they know that Bark is the most courageous dog there is and he want all of his stuff back.

Help Bark regain all of his belongings and save his friends in the ultimate monster-maze puzzle adventure.

Just Have Fun!

name: Heroes: The Official Mobile Game
description: Join Hiro, Niki, Peter and more in the official, exclusive game of TV's most talked-about series, Heroes, and experience the show's mind-bending universe on your mobile phone. Relive the series' thrills by entering an epic game that chronicles the lives of ordinary people who discover they possess extraordinary abilities - and an ultimate destiny to save the world! Experience the excitement of super-human abilities as you sneak into places unnoticed, save lives and fight enemies with astounding skill.

name: Call of the Wild: The Angler - Deluxe Edition
description: Be free to fish where you choose in a unique and approachable open world fishing experience. Explore the great outdoors on your own or with friends and find the catch of a lifetime.

name: New York Nights 2: Friends For Life
description: New York Nights 2: Friends For Life is an interaction-based action-adventure video game developed by Gameloft New York and published by Gameloft. It was released for button-operated mobile phones and Android and iOS devices in 2008. It is the sequel to New York Nights: Success in the City.

name: Cat Apartment
description: Cat Apartment is a 2.5D, swivel, find gameplay, dynamic cat hunt game where you need to take care of all the cats in the apartment. Find cute cats hidden in a relaxing apartment.

name: Quadroids
description: Quadroids is a mind-twisting pixel-art strategy puzzle platformer that disrupts the genre with a major twist. Players get to clear 100+ hazard-filled interconnected levels by coordinating their minions simultaneously across four screens.

name: The Third Age
description: Magical SLG Masterpiece Real Strategy & Exclusive Heroes Together into Battle.

name: Ascent Quest
description: Enter the world of Aelys in this incredible online RPG made for virtual reality ! Meet hundreds of players, form your party of adventurers (or go solo) and fulfill your destiny in this high-fantasy story-driven universe … or hang out laughing in the local tavern with your friends!

name: Lone Fungus: Melody of Spores
description: Explore an interconnected mushroom world filled with secrets. Unite the mushroom tribes and experience the origin story of our hero Greencap that eventually leads to the events of the first game.

name: Hell University
description: Explore yet another indie metroidvania as you venture through the Hell University campus. Conquer the demons that infest the essence of Hell University, and save the school from certain doom.

name: Sculpturn
description: "Dive into 'Sculpturn,' a psychological horror. Explore the protagonist's mind, unearthing secrets while evading a relentless mannequin. Unique mechanic: maintain gaze to escape pursuit. Your focus is your lifeline in this chilling game.

name: Paradox Metal
description: This game was inspired by Japan's most famous stealth spy action game.

name: Shadows of Soldiers
description: A team-based third person shooter, with an emphasis on futuristic devices to create tactical teamplay.

name: World Ends Wednesday
description: Join Hazel on a quest to uncover a mysterious treasure before other like-minded adventurers reach it first. The key to your victory lies in the mastery of timing-based RPG combat!

name: Eternal Summer
description: Unmixing reality!

name: Cozy Trip
description: Embark on a Cozy Trip like no other! Immerse yourself in the joy of exploration, tranquility, and discovery. Unwind and relax as you navigate the town and its enchanting forest, uncovering hidden treasures along the way. Experience the magic today!

name: Breaking Box: Walk
description: A physics puzzle game that can only walk!

name: Shine of Fullmoon
description: Shine of Fullmoon is a novel game where you interact with your friends in a peaceful Full Moon Village and continue your story by taking adventures thereafter. Let's choose what kind of stories you will continue with our unique friends and what kind of adventures you will take with them.

name: Sube
description: In this game, you will play a junior high school student who doesn't like learning, and all you have to do every day is go to school, finish school, and sleep.

name: ImpossiBowl
description: ImpossiBowl is a Chaotically Challenging Bowling Game with Platforming mechanics. Explore a variety of Weird Levels, Unlock new Balls and Powers on your journey to become the Champion!

name: Portals: Escape the Infinity
description: A transcendent point-and-click puzzle adventure. Can you escape 50 Portals?

name: Call of Sentinels
description: Call of Sentinels is an exciting action game where you will have to challenge real evil! Epic battles await you with hordes of diverse enemies and charismatic bosses that will not leave you indifferent.

name: Chez Croggy
description: Chef Croggy, AKA Croggster, AKA Croggison, is on the trip of a lifetime! Get ready for a gruesome, and rage inducing experience as you run, jump, and push your way through the wacky physics and camera angles Chez Croggy has to offer.

name: Dinobreak
description: Dinosaurs have returned in this retro survival horror crisis.

name: Arcane's Watch
description: After Returning to your hometown in search of your missing father, you find that the town has been abandoned, search for clues around the town to find your father, but be careful, you aren't the only one there.

name: Stay Still 2
description: Welcome to Stay Still 2, a spine-chilling first-person survival horror game. Based of the Vietnamese culture, this game unfolds as a daring experiment in which survival seems nearly impossible. Engage in a story gameplay, where puzzles are your key to progress, while surviving various threats.

name: Hexagold
description: Turn based roguelike strategy. Explore hexagonal lands, recruit units, build defenses, grow farms to raise stable economy, loot mysterious artefacts and survive against this dangerous world.

name: The World is Drowning
description: The world is drowning, and everyone you know is gone. If you wish to survive, you'll have to climb to the moon. On your way up you’ll encounter many traps and monsters, but remember, you must never stop. The sea of blood is coming, and it will rob you of your final breath.

name: Kairai Inn
description: A score-attack action game where you aim for high scores by subduing dangerous "kairai."

name: Speed Heroes
description: Speed Heroes - Addictive, simple and a hard, fun , fantastic feeling!

name: Call of the Wild: The Angler - Launch Edition
description: Be free to fish where you choose in a unique and approachable open world fishing experience. Explore the great outdoors on your own or with friends and find the catch of a lifetime.

name: Ancient Weapon Holly
description: After tens of thousands of years, the ancient weapon Holly awakens, starting her revenge against humanity. Experience the strategy of creating pitfalls to trap enemies and the exhilaration of burying them alive. Dive into intense combat!

name: Vacation Adventures: Park Ranger 15 - Collector's Edition
description: Help Rangers run Pinecreek Hills and enjoy National Park activities.

name: Slightly Overweight Superhero and the Seven Levels of Death
description: You're an average guy, traveling a Neon futuristic Wasteland. Survive the story between life, and the Seven levels of Death.

name: Air Fleet
description: Build your dream airline with Air Fleet! Plan routes, Expand your fleet, Organize flights around the world and Build a successful airline company!

name: 13 Playing Cards of Demon
description: This is a strategy game. Collect and use demon‘s poker skills (similar to Texas Poker rules), regular card skills, abilities, and equipment to defeat enemies.

name: Jon Story
description: Sin descripción

name: Eye of Artist
description: Eye of Artist is a 3D puzzle game where you have to place some items from a list where they belong. Look for clues in your surroundings, carefully study each yard and don't forget: it's not as easy as it seems at first glance!

name: The Girl with the Guitar
description: A short bullet-ridden action-adventure experience where you kill robots by smashing them with a flying guitar. Learn to stop living life bullet after bullet as you leverage deadly momentum against projectiles and enemies, saving the galaxy and shredding some awesome tunes along the way!

name: Psyche60s
description: Immerse yourself in Psyche60s, an innovative experience that takes you back to San Francisco in the 1960s. Created by renowned photographer Roberto Rabanne, Psyche60s features unique artwork, original music, and rich historical insights. Experience a paradigm-shifting cultural "Youthquake"!

name: Greedy Chicken
description: Greedy Chicken is a 3D arcarde "endless-runner" type of game where you need to lead small chicken through the numerous obstacles, highway passes and collect as many coins as you can.

name: Darkless
description: Nameless embodies a mischievous ghost who after a terrible curse has been placed on him, locking him in a lamp. It will be your purpose to recover your ghostly body by traveling through all the corners of the Silent Mansion in a platform and puzzle game.

name: Walkabout Mini Golf: Alfheim
description: Perfect your mini golf for an eternity amidst a gleaming, spiritual realm untouched by time: Alfheim - Land of Elves. A hidden realm of light and beauty from Norse mythology, this serene and timeless course grants you calm and supernatural beauty in a spellbinding and relaxing forest hideaway.

name: Jigsaw-Land
description: A relaxing puzzle game with procedurally generated puzzle of different natural biomes.

name: The Encounter
description: This game tells the story of a Chinese family who inexplicably disappeared in 1999. Afterwards, a journalist was sent by the TV station to investigate and visit this incident and the subsequent events. The final outcome will be unimaginable to you! Looking forward to your experience!

name: Half Alive
description: Half Alive is a Low Poly Multiplayer FPS Game. Survive each round of zombies after which a more difficult round begins. Enlarge your playing area and your weapons backpack to provide yourself good chances of survival!

name: Ghost Hunter
description: Ghost Hunter is an online collaborative psychological horror game that can be played by at least one and up to five players together. Unlike other ghost hunting games, it incorporates rich Taoist elements and experiences traditional Chinese supernatural culture.

name: Vaccine Rebirth VR
description: Enter once again into the world of Survival Horror, this time in VR.

name: Archetype Blue
description: Archetype Blue is a rogue-lite deck building game where you form your own adventure team and deck before facing the challenges this fantasy world has in store for you. With all the options in front of you and the circumstances surrounding your expedition, do you have any chance of succeeding?

name: The Great Below
description: Immerse yourself in a haunting map-based horror experience. Break free from the loop and the mansion where you find yourself while unveiling the secrets underneath it all. The Society expects something from you but are you ready to face the consequences?

name: Burden of the Blue
description: Explore, solve puzzles and fight in order to uncover the burdens of the past.

name: Cosmosiege
description: Cosmosiege is a reverse tower defense auto battle game. The task at each level is to destroy the towers located in the center of the screen with the help of summoned combat units. Place your units in real time and try to defeat the enemy base!

name: Jack Dragon
description: Jack Dragon is a retro love letter to 80s arcade videogaming. Collect all of the gem pieces to progress to the next level. Avoid touching the nasties. Collect the snowflake power up to freeze enemies in place (you are an ice dragon, after all!). Just jump, hover and collect! Sounds easy, right?

name: Rage of Towers
description: Rage of Towers is a modern Realistic Tower defense game. Typically, you build towers on the path to destroy enemies before they reach the end, But what if you could take control of the tower by yourself and feel the battlefield.

name: Zed Patrol
description: Zed Patrol is a co-op 3D top-down zombie shooter that puts you in the middle of a post-apocalyptic world overrun by the undead. Your squad's mission: to take out the four bosses and retrieve the keycards to save the city. But with hordes of zombies around every corner, it won't be easy!

name: LOTL
description: Unleash legendary Axolotl warriors in an isometric hack and slash. Crush mind-controlled beasts, defy Lord Voidborn, and free the Known Worlds. Solo or co-op, the battle for light begins. Ready to fight "a-lotl"? Wishlist now!

name: Incubus Quest
description: When the succubi's ambush almost annihilates all of the incubi, a miracle happens and you're able to fight them back. It's now up to you to finally end this feud between the races and bring peace back to the land!

name: Loverse
description: Navigate the duality of a raw, real world and the neon glow of Loverse. Unravel mysteries in both realms, alongside alluring allies. Whether in VR or reality, intrigue awaits. Dive deep into Loverse's dual allure.

name: Alien Investigator
description: Alien investigator is a 4 player online co-op horror game. Join a team of investigators and use all your alien expert equipment to gather as much evidence as you can. Learn extraterrestrial facts based on photos, videos and real life eyewitness accounts.

name: Chromaticasters
description: Chromaticasters is a chaotically cute co-op dungeon crawler where you and up to 3 friends play as unique spell-slinging animals! Combine elemental magic with your friends to crush hordes of enemies, traverse dangerous environments, and strengthen your spells in this action-packed roguelike!

name: Valerosa
description: Put yourself in the role of the courageous women and discover the challenges they had to face throughout the different eras. Fight for the fundamental rights of women in Argentina, choosing your arguments wisely and responding in the best way to win the debate.

name: Just Find It 3
description: Explore hidden variations and engage with exciting new challenges in Just Find It 3!

name: Scary Loop
description: A bone-chilling point-and-click horror game that will keep you on the edge of your seat from start to finish. Prepare to navigate through a nightmarish landscape filled with jumpscares, sinister puzzles, and terrifying creatures that will test your wits and nerves like never before.

name: Mutagenesis
description: Mutagenesis is post apocalyptic colony management simulation. Build your base, upgrade your defences, research new technologies and defend your bunker against mutated people and other factions no mather what.

name: Super Spy Raccoon
description: Your mission, if you choose to accept it, is to acquire all classified documents as you venture deeper and deeper into enemy territory. Hide, sneak, climb, and leap your way to victory!

name: Project_03
description: Project_03 is aiming to give you the missed old school fps experience in the new era of gaming.Quick matches in various maps and gamemodes, also the practice range to improve your skills in a fun way.

name: Up N' Down
description: Up N' Down is a multiplayer racing game where you have to use items to your advantage. Race to the top, grab the crown and find a safe way down to the finish line.

name: Legacy's Allure
description: Legacy's Allure is a customizable, card-based wargame with no randomness. Command warriors, beasts, and mages on the battlefield to outplay your opponent in this chess-inspired fantasy battle.

name: Sociable Soccer 24
description: Sociable Soccer 24 is the exhilarating, cross-platform, arcade football franchise. Designed by Sensible Soccer creator Jon Hare, this former title on Apple Arcade has fast-paced, arcade-style intuitive gameplay, with multiplayer head-to-head matches and collectible player cards.

name: Cyberjump
description: Cyberjump is a fast paced 2D cyberpunk-themed platformer game where you need to jump on platforms that appear only for a short time and avoiding deadly traps, keeping track of the time of existence of the platforms and think over the movements in advance so as not to fall down.

name: Anlife: Motion-Learning Life Evolution
description: Intervene in the evolution of virtual lifeforms that learn to move in a world powered by a physics engine. This world already features built-in mechanisms like heredity and natural selection. The player acts as a creator, manipulating these natural processes to help lifeforms learn and evolve.

name: Uncult
description: 'Uncult' is a pixel RPG where the protagonist, the daughter of a cult leader, suffers from amnesia after an accident in a fanatical pseudo-religious group. Now, she must piece together her obscured past, facing numerous challenges and uncovering the truth. Your decisions will shape her destiny.

name: King of Hearts
description: King of Hearts: a dark, intricate fantasy kingdom sim. You're the lone human amidst enigmatic creatures. Build a realm, face divergent desires, manage advisors and your psyche. No knights in shining armor—just shadows, secrets, and tough choices. Can you rule when happiness is uncertain?

name: Fantasy Monster Clicker
description: Are you bored? Then step into the world of Fantasy Monster Clicker! Enjoy and explore a world full of upgrades, levels, monsters and bosses.

name: The Sheriff's Town
description: The Sheriff's Town is a game where you control a sheriff to exterminate hordes of zombies.

name: Dagger Directive
description: Dagger Directive is a tactical FPS that allows you to approach each mission in your own way. Select equipment, decide the time of day, then move methodically to complete your mission. Enjoy the modern mechanics and old school graphics as you fight across a variety of missions and environments.

name: Hex Jump
