description: The game has many levels in which you need to solve various puzzles. At each level, the player needs to get from the starting point to the final one, solve the puzzle and avoid traps along the way.

name: Echoes
description: A 2D dungeon exploration game that can be played quickly.

name: Livestream 2: Escape from Togaezuka Happy Place
description: Can you escape the horror of being hunted down...? The sequel to the survival horror game "Livestream: Escape from Hotel Izanami" is now available!

name: VRogue
description: Ported directly from the open source project, VRogue is the classic game Rogue in an entirely new perspective: Virtual Reality! Dare the Dungeons of Doom to deliver the Amulet of Yendor... and then find your way back out!

name: Find Up!
description: Find the differences between two images. Export images as wallpapers. Built-in game editor allows players to make their own game content. Support Steam workshop to share the ugc content.

name: Fantasy Kommander: Eukarion Wars
description: Immerse yourself in the epic battles of Fantasy Kommander, a turn-based strategy game set in a European fantasy world. Lead your armies, master the battle system, and unravel the captivating storyline across four campaigns filled with heroes, quests, and powerful enemies.

name: Sniper Wild West Shooting Simulator
description: Experience the thrill of sniping in the Wild West! Realistic FPS experience awaits you with Sniper Wild West Shooting Simulator. Shoot your enemies with one shot and become the best sniper.

name: GarbageGame
description: This game is one of the GarbageGame in the GarbageGame's world ,which means you can find a lot of garbage things in this game

name: Ship Smash
description:
Wanna Smash?
Ship Smash is a unique, fast-paced, tower defense style, action game that requires quick and accurate fingers but timing and strategy as well. Use the octopus's arms and ink to smash and blast the enemy ships before they bring your health to zero. Along the way, you'll encounter new ships with different speeds, health and attack styles. Beat levels to unlock new zones, each with their own unique location and hazard. Earn stars and complete unique challenges to unlock fun costumes. Can you earn all 180 stars?

name: ZomBehead!
description:
"ZomBehead!" is a variation of clicker games, it features 18 non-stop crazy levels, funny characters, bonuses and surprises, a cool story line and original mechanics not seen in other clickers.
You must have good concentration and fast reflexes.
The name of the game ZomBehead! is a combination of Behead and Zombie (Behead the Zombie!). Said aloud, it sounds like Zombie Head.

name: Just Get 2048: A Simple Puzzle Game!
description: New addictive 2048 gameplay!

name: Symbol Link
description:
Solve puzzles pairing up matching symbols with a single path.
Team up with your iPhone or iPad artificial intelligence to score points by drawing autolinks – two symbols automatically connected when definite path between them exists.

name: RookStar
description:
You control five rooks that move in straight lines until they hit a wall or another rook.
For each problem, try to move the rook with the same color as the target to the target position (rotating star) in as few moves as possible. Play with friends or compete against others in the daily challenges.

name: Tricky Gems
description:
The point of this game is to match a line or diagonal of three or more gems, using columns of three pieces falling into the playing field and to get as much points as possible. At the end of each level, a column of bomb blocks appear and whatever color gem it touches, all of them disappear. This special column also appears when you press the bomb button that is available after the Power-up Bar is filled up. The background changes between levels and the columns move gradually faster. If you lose the game the playing field will be filled in with exploding bombs.

Test how good you really are and try to get all of the 23 Achievements. Some of them require real master control over the game. You need quick thinking, fast reflexes and good game strategy in order to score enough points to become "Gem Legend".

name: One Thousand and One Nights
description: This game tells the story of the breathtaking adventures of the eastern Don Juan whose name is Habib in the gorgeous sultan's palace full of beautiful concubines, guards and treasures.

name: Brick Breaker
description: Brick Breaker is a video game developed by Canadian Developer Ali Asaria that came preloaded on certain BlackBerry devices and is now available on the iOS App Store.

name: Angry Birds Dice
description: Angry Birds Dice was a cancelled online virtual board game, involving Angry Birds characters as they appear in The Angry Birds Movie and soft-launched by the Korean mobile game company Joycity, in which players attempt to collect property and bankrupt their opponents by having them land on it.

name: My Little Pony: Equestria Girls - Friendship Games: Motocross
description: Join Equestria Girls in Motocross Friendship Games contest. Grab your motorcycle and race to the finish line in Equestria' s biggest sports event!

name: The Dark Tower
description: The Dark Tower is a side-scrolling Apple II adventure. Guide the character via keyboard, solving puzzles, gathering items, and defeating the dragon to claim King Arthur's crown jewels, all while encountering Merlin and ghosts.

name: Apothecary
description: A cute story-driven zen puzzler in which you brew potions, customize your workshop, and interact with the quirky residents of the magical town of Mangrove.

name: Cellosseum
description: Cellosseum is a bullet heaven following the progress of a lone cell as it battles a variety of enemies on its quest to guide the evolutionary process of life itself. Upgrade your attacks, shields, health, and speed to understand your role in the creation of life on the planet of Ceres Prime.

name: DanceDouDoou
description: DanceDouDoou is a rhythm /Beat/Dance Simulation Game where you,and your fellow animals can practice dance move By Mouse Click and Drag.Players will witness how goofy Fellows can move theire body,and Smashing variaty of Items to make Noises. Just Dance around on Stage and,Have Fun!

name: Destroy Korcity
description: Tower shooting game with cool music and endless enemies

name: Springtime Hike
description: Experience the beauty of spring and the wonders of the forest in Springtime Hike. Explore hidden locations, uncover the secrets of nature, and complete the ultimate hike. Your journey begins now.

name: The Mythical City
description: Protect the magic crystal, to which waves of enemies are coming!

name: Egg Drop
description: Flutter around to dodge falling eggs from chickens above, and collect corn and power ups to drop eggs on the unlucky fowl below!

name: Little Wing
description: Embark on a dangerous journey through the wilderness, searching for the Little Wing, atop the Mountain - in this challenging and charming platformer. Brave levels with many dangers, with tight and precise jumping, stamina management and attacks. Can you find the Little Wing?

name: Super Gorilla Quest
description: A comedic gorilla RPG wherein you must save all life from humanity through intense combat.

name: Boggle
description: Test your knowledge of the English words in a mobile version of the popular puzzle game of Hasbro company! Create groups of randomly dropped letters on the dice words, the longer will be the word and the sooner you will form it, the more points you will get. The game has 4 different modes: classic, arcade, in which to go to the next level you should get a certain score, a game against time and a game to play with your friend. The game is not only good for your intellect and vocabulary, but also has simple controls, beautiful graphics and nice sound. Detailed statistics and results table will allow you to see the words that you have made, as well as those you have missed. This will help you to be much luckier next time!

name: Le Crime Du Parking
description: French crime point & click featuring heavy nudity and sexual content

name: The Daily Sudoku
description: A new Sudoku puzzle each day! Indulge in your daily habit with all the bells and whistles from some classic Sudoku including notes, auto-cleanup, and slash notes.

name: Mini Sudoku Keychain
description: A playable Sudoku LCD game that also is a keychain.

name: Pool Lounge
description: Welcome to Pool Lounge! Play the game mode you want. Traditional 8-Ball, Blackball and 9-Ball!

name: Plants vs. Zombies
description: An in-flight port of Plants vs. Zombies.

name: Mickey Mouse: Date Dash
description: Mickey is late again! Help him find his way through all the obstacles and get to his date with Minnie in time.

name: Day 10,909
description: One day, a light falls from the sky! For 10909 days, everything in your life seemed completely normal, until suspicion suddenly arose. You decide to escape the set and journey to Fiji to find your first love, who said that everything is a show.

name: First Strike: Multiplayer
description: The multiplayer mode for First Strike is here! Wage nuclear war against other players from all over the world and nuke the Earth into nuclear Armageddon together. Will you be the last one remaining when the whole world blows to smithereens?

name: The Incredibles: Jack-Jack's Escape
description: Heroic Baby Hijinx! The game takes place within the Underminer’s colossal digger. You control Jack-Jack, the infant member of the Incredibles. A Disney game.

name: Bikkuri Pro Wrestling
description: Wrestling video game released in Japan in 1988.

name: Billiard Academy Real Break
description: A pool game where you are awarded Pictures of some Asian babes when you win the round.

name: Rumia Throws!
description: Nagerumia, Hanerumia, Suberumia (Throwing mia, splashing mia, sliding mia).

name: Pirates of the Seven Seas
description: If you are fascinated by the world of pirates and have always dreamed of crossing swords and emptying your pistol into a horde of bloodthirsty, wild enemies, Pirates of the Seven Seas is the must-have game for your mobile phone. Once downloaded, a fabulous adventure awaits you on your phone, where you'll get to play a reckless pirate braving the greatest dangers on the hunt for a lost treasure. In the jungle, on a boat, in the pirate town, or on an antique surfboard, you'll also get the chance to free the sexiest prisoners along the way!

name: Jack Holmes: Master of Puppets - Prologue
description: In this prologue you will step into the shoes of little Eddie, a 12 year old boy who goes to the amusement park with his parents until what would be a fun day out turns into a nightmare. Experience the terrifying atmosphere of what awaits you in Jack Holmes: Master of Puppets!

name: Logic Colors
description: Logic Colors is Indie Logic Game in which You move color tiles to solve riddles. Discover rules and relax in 225 unique levels and unlock all items in game! Will You finish them perfectly?

name: Sweet Neighbors
description: "Sweet Neighbors" is a visual novel for adults only. The main character Ethan moves to a new neighborhood and becomes involved in a love triangle with young Ava and her mother Olivia. He faces a difficult choice - who to stay with and who to lose.

name: Devil Peach Soda
description: Carve your way through a twisted and demonic manor in this fast paced roguelike. Devil Peach Soda combines quick arcade gameplay and RPG mechanics, featuring a variety of ways to build and customize your character each run.

name: ZomWick
description: Zomwick is a unique non-violent 3D tower defense game where the objective is to outlast enemies by using tactics and upgrades instead of using lethal brute force. It's addictive, challenging, and requires resourcefulness to survive.With free content updates, it's a must-play for TD fans.

name: Spaceminers
description: Welcome to the world of Spaceminers and our exclusive pre-alpha release Spaceminers: Gold Runner. This thrilling game mode serves as the first step in your journey towards becoming a skilled Spaceminer.

name: Planeticus
description: Planeticus is a 2D multiplayer space strategy game about capturing planets and allocating resources. Capture as many planets as possible to breed invaders. Conquer the whole space!

name: Felicia
description: Sin descripción

name: Airborne Ranger
description: Airborne Ranger is a cancelled action game / third person shooter that was in development by Microprose for the Super Nintendo. The game was a sequel / remake of the original Airborne Ranger released in 1987 / 1988 for Amiga and various PCs. As the original version, we would have play as a sole airborne military to infiltrate enemy territory to complete various objectives. It’s currently unknown if the SNES version was going to use the same level system as the original game, that created maps and objective locations randomly so missions were never the same.

name: Les trois Mousquetaires
description: Les trois Mousquetaires (The Three Musketeers) is an action game that was in development by Loriciel for the Super Nintendo, but it seems that the project was later cancelled as we cant find any evidence of its release.

name: Venom Spirit
description: Venom Spirit is a cancelled action adventure that was in development for Super Nintendo around 1994 by the Pickford Bros, while they were working at Software Creations and after publishing their cult-classic Plok. The game was planned to use pre-rendered 3D graphics on the 16-Bit console, somehow similar to what Rare also did with their Donkey Kong Country series. While Venom Spirit was never officially announced by the company, many details about the project were shared online by John and Ste Pickford.

name: Ochanoma Densetsu
description: Ochanoma Densetsu is a cancelled RPG / board game hybrid that was in development for the Super Famicom (SNES) and would have been published by Information Global Service. There are basically no details about what the game was going to be like, but an advertisement announcing the game was published in an old IGS catalog.

name: Crossroad of Worlds: Star Riddle Collector's Edition
description: Continue your detective journey and stop the star thefts! There is no peace for the magical stars of the worlds. Draw out all of the secrets from a captured villain and find the true mastermind behind the vile conspiracy!

name: Metamor Kid Goomin
description: Metamor Kid Goomin (Goromin) is a cancelled platform / action adventure game that was in development for the Super Famicom / Super Nintendo by BPS.

name: Molotov Man
description: Sin descripción

name: Monster Truck Wars
description: Monster Truck Wars is a cancelled racing game that was in development for the Super Nintendo and it would have been published by Acclaim. A GameBoy and Game Gear versions of the game were released in 1994 and 1995, but they were different from the SNES version, that used “Mode 7” graphic similar to F-Zero.

name: Brimstone
description: Sensible Software is a studio embedded in gaming history for many reasons outside of the admittedly immortal Sensible Soccer. Along with the Canon Fodder games – the destructive sibling of Sensible's popular football sim – the company's commitment to the 16-bit Amiga proved that, sometimes, you can achieve impossibly addictive gaming perfection even with the most cartoon-like of visuals. Make a game addictive, and if it's being played by enough people, you've succeeded – and the fame of Sensible's output during the '90s suggests that it was something of a triumph.

name: Kanosen: My Girlfriend is a Naughty Teacher
description: Hatori Yuu has a problem: his sex drive is so ridiculously strong it's disrupting his day to day life. Lucky for him, Kaori-sensei is determined to help him enjoy his school life! And so begins their secretive school affair...

name: Codename: Horror Game
description: The prototype for Resident Evil started development on the SNES. It didn't bear the current name yet, and took place in a kind of a hellish setting. It was a spiritual successor for the Famicom title Sweet Home.

name: Reactor
description: Sin descripción

name: Satellite Man
description: Sin descripción

name: Future Zone
description: Sin descripción

name: Super Battletoads
description: Cancelled Game Boy port of Battletoads (Arcade).

name: Fera: The Sundered Tribes
description: Fera: The Sundered Tribes is an enthralling mixture of monster hunting action RPG with village building and tribe management in a unique post-apocalyptic fantastical world of untamed magic and ancient secrets.

name: Pirate Booty and the Bukkake Buccaneer
description: Spread your seed across the seven seas! Your first-mate staged a mutiny, taking off with your precious ship. You'll have to build up a loyal crew, one slut at a time, to take back your ship and get revenge on the wench who took it from you in the first place!

name: Helltrench
description: Delve into the Helltrench as the T.O.N, a ship that thrusts with its shots. In this shoot to move action rogue-like, conquer the depths with your slick maneuvering skills until you've reached the end.

name: Manga Maker's Mega Milkers
description: Your favorite lewd artist has a proposition for you: Show her your cock, and she'll show you her tits. Continue to collaborate with Yuko, exploring each other's fantasies to collect erotic reference material for her big manga debut!

name: Wordchain
description: Wordchain is a daily word game where players are given a starting letter and a scrambled set of additional letters. Players must use those letters to form a word from the starting letter. The last letter of that word becomes the first letter of the next word to be made.

name: Cold Shot
description: Play the role of a contract killer that must perform a job during a cold night. The target is Spencer York, an apparently ordinary man living on the outskirts of a rural town. After driving for hours, everything is settled up to end the job fast. You only have to pull the trigger one more time, like the countless times you did before.

name: Oh, Yes! Kasshoku Hitozuma no Seiyoku Kaishou ~Ero Ero Dekiru Mama-san Volley Kai~
description:
I broke the cherished glass of my mother’s. As a punishment, I was made to serve and do odd chores for a fixed period in the volleyball club, my mother does as a hobby.

But perhaps, might not there be some young married woman and elder sisters among them!
…While I carried such hope, there was no one except typical aunts.
There was not even a fragment of elder sister types among anyone I looked at.

name: Project Bonfire
description: Sin descripción

name: Golden Idol Mysteries: The Lemurian Vampire
description: Unravel the truth of an ancient civilisation, lost in time through three brand-new scenarios, filled with death, deceit, and ancient rituals.

name: Rugrats: Adventures in Gameland
description: A baby-fresh take on retro-inspired gameplay, featuring a unique co-op design, where kids and parents need to stick together to win!

name: Undefeated: Genesis
description: The ultimate superhero experience. Fly freely and unleash your awesome powers as you battle violent mutants to save an alien planet.

name: Yoshitsune Densetsu
description: Yoshitsune Densetsu is a cancelled action RPG that was in development around 1993, planned to be published by ASCII on the Super Famicom / SNES. The game told the fictionalized story of Minamoto no Yoshitsune a “military commander of the Minamoto clan of Japan, that after evading death made his way past Hokkaido and sailed to the mainland of Asia, re-surfacing as Genghis Khan“.

name: Cluster Buster
description: Written by Jonathan Smith (known programmer for his Spectrum works) when he was first hired at Rage Software, the game was a shoot ’em up scheduled for Super Nintendo around 1993. Sadly Cluster Buster never found a publisher.

name: Dragon's Heaven
description: Dragon’s Heaven is a cancelled JRPG that was in development by Digitalware in the late ’90s, planned to be published for the Super Famicom and later on the Sega Saturn by Data East.

name: Gaishin Senki: Millennium Sword
description: Gaishin Senki: Millennium Sword is a cancelled strategy RPG that was planned by Magifact to be released on Super Famicom / SNES around 1995.

name: Joe vs. The Wall
description: Joe VS. The Wall is a cancelled side scrolling action adventure in development / to be published by Ocean Software for the Super Nintendo, around 1992. It was listed by Nintendo Power (issue 34, March 1992) as one of the games shown by Ocean at the ‘92 Winter CES.

name: Killer Instinct 2
description: Cancelled SNES port of Killer Instinct 2.

name: Mer Wars
description: Sin descripción

name: Mumu Boukenki Amusing Dream
description: Amusing Dream is a cancelled RPG that was in development by Takara Amusement for the Super Famicom / Super Nintendo. There are not much more info on the project and it’s unknown why it was never released.

name: Nandemo!? Taihoman
description: Nandemo!? Taihoman is a cancelled action platformer that was in development by Namco around 1995, planned to be released on the Super Famicom / SNES. A short preview of the game was also published in EGM (April 1995 issue), but in the end the game was never released in any region.

name: G.I. Joe: Wrath of Cobra
description: Yo Joe! Cobra returns once again with its most fiendish plot yet and it's up to G.I. JOE to defeat them once more! Pick one of the real American heroes, gear up, and get straight into the fight in this retro side-scrolling beat 'em up - and make Cobra RETREAT yet again!

name: Popil
description: Popil is an obscure platform game that was in development by Sunsoft for the Super Nintendo / Super Famicom.

name: Geo Mythica
description: Embark on an 8-bit style JRPG quest to save Earth. Battle in unique party-based combat mixing real-time action and strategic commands. Join Gio and a team of lively characters as they unearth bizarre global events, forgotten legends, and battle mythical foes to unveil the secrets of Geo Mythica.

name: Radio Flyer
description: Radio Flyer is a cancelled flying game that was in development by Ocean in 1992 for the Super Nintendo. It seems that the project was based on the film with the same name from Columbia Pictures, in which 2 young brothers escape their chaotic family life with dreams of flying. Inspired by a local legend, they attempt to build a working airplane from their ordinary red wagon.

name: Robosaurus
description: Robosaurus is a cancelled action game that was in development around 1992 by Adrenalin Entertainment and THQ (at the time known as “Toy Headquarters”) for Super Nintendo.

name: Shadow Stalker
description: Shadow Stalker is a cancelled 2D side scrolling action game that was in development in 1993 by Athena for the Super Nintendo / Super Famicom.

name: Street Dunk
description: Street Dunk is a cancelled baskteball game that was in development by Nippon Bussan (aka Nichibutsu) for the Super Nintendo / Super Famicom.

name: Just Crow Things
description: Play as a cute crow, fly around town, poop on people, and steal their shiny trinkets! In this sandbox-y adventure game, help your animal friends create adorable chaos and have a beak-tastic time customizing your adorable crow appearance! Why? Just caws!

name: Bandido
description:
Mobile adaptation of the cardgame.
A light-security prisoner is trying to escape through tunnels starting underneath his cell. Will you be able to join forces and cards to stop him? Bandido is a cooperative game of strategy and observation for the entire family.

name: Sei Shoujo Sentai Lakers II
description: The sequel to Sei Shōjo Sentai Lakers directly continues the story from the previous game. Akira and his team of school girls with supernatural powers have repelled Galvan's forces and protected the Laker Crystals. However, a new adversary named Rayott appears on the stage. Obtaining his power from Leticia, the former commander of the Gadram Empire, Rayott intends to use the power of the crystals in order to invade Earth.

name: Sei Shoujo Sentai Lakers III
description: In the sequel to Sei Shōjo Sentai Lakers II Akira and his team have successfully fended off Rayott's assault and are enjoying a brief peaceful time. However, an enigmatic masked enemy known as Neos Bullard appears on the stage. Aiming to capture the power of Laker crystals, Neos Bullard and his minions invade Earth, taking the Lakers by surprise.

name: Rapz
description: Rapz! is about a young girl, Rapulani, with a magical afro who must endure many great obstacles and a gauntlet of an adventure with her magical hair, just to get through the day. You must help Rapulani navigate her complicated 5 year old life and her wild hair as she tries to get through the day in order to make it to a friends’ birthday party. Good luck!

name: Yugekitai Kakuto-hen: Saikyoushin Fukkatsu no Maki
description: This is a fighting game from a doujin developer that did a number of games involving the comically-deformed gang that stars in this one. Lots of humor value.

name: The Villainess Just Wants to Eat!!
description: Life’s greatest pleasures are food and fantasy manhwa. When reading, you can drool over hot characters and delicious looking food. After a late night of reading your favorite manhwa, you fall into the land of sleep and dream of being the fiance of the prince…only it isn't a dream! You’ve been reincarnated as the villainess! Will you be able to survive and live your dream of eating delicious food, or will you suffer the deadly fate of all villainesses?

name: Takamori Puzzle
description: A puzzle-story fan game about Calli & Kiara from Hololive.

name: Cute Blocks
description: Cute Blocks.This is a simple arkanoid game. Shoot down blocks with a constantly moving ball and do not let it fly down.

name: Armor Mayhem
description: Armor Mayhem is a side-scrolling shooter game developed by Louissi. It features a full-fledged campaign, which is played both to progress through the story and earn money which is used to purchase new weapons and armor from the armory.

name: D3L3T3.exe
description: Racing against time, a guy wanders around a graveyard on the middle of nowhere, searching for something that may break a deadly curse. Among murders and secrets, only darkness is certain.

name: Survival RPG 4: Haunted Manor
description:
A ghost, a haunted house, an epic quest adventure you won't forget! Survival RPG 4: Haunted Manor is the 4th game of the 2D retro Survival RPG (Role playing game) adventure series. The story begins with the disappearance of your magical artefact. Your quest is to find it by exploring the ghost haunted manor and its surroundings.
To solve the mystery, you will have to explore a haunted house, lost temples and other dungeons, fight ghosts, discover hidden objects and treasures and unlock puzzles. Find out who is behind the mystery of the Survival RPG series, from the stranger who was asking for your help to the villain messing with the timeline.

name: Cupid Bistro!! Max
description: This rerelease of Cupid Bistro!! updates the game with additional in-game content, including the ability to build a larger and more expansive restaurant.

name: A Little to the Left: Deep Clean
description: These new food-themed Snack Pack levels come as part of the Deep Clean update, which also adds two new puzzle types into the Daily Tidy mode and a fan-requested Archive mode.

name: PowerWash Simulator: The Muckingham Files 2
description: Three new filthy maps have arrived in PowerWash Simulator in the latest instalment of The Muckingham Files; a series of free content updates expanding the game’s original universe. Whilst residents dish the dirt on your favourite town’s antics, you’ll be busy cleaning up their messes as you're tasked with de-dirtying an Excavator, a Spanish Villa and a Paintball Arena.

name: Cupid Bistro!! 2
description: Cupid Bistro!! 2 has the player returning to the world of magical cooking. Like in the last game, players manage a magical restaurant in a business simulation; to obtain ingredients, they can venture forth in the game's RPG mode. It features a new cast of romanceable women and a new battle system compared to the original game.

name: Godzilla Voxel Wars
description: Get ready to battle using your brain! A full-fledged turn-based strategy game with a difficulty level: GODZILLA! Godzilla, Mothra, King Ghidorah, and more are here to rampage across an 8x8 grid! Control Toho monsters and save the world from the Fungoid mushroom invasion!

name: He Watches Me
description:
He's watching me... I know he is. As soon as I feel his eyes on me my heartbeat quickens and I grab my chest, trying to control my breathing. This isn't good for my condition... I'm so anxious and stiff. This happens every day. I don't know what I should do to make him stop... please. I just want him to stop...

Sara only wants a simple life at school but when her classmate Tyler keeps watching her from the back of the room she just can't ignore it. She's tried, but something just, isn’t right...

name: What the Golf? A Hole New World
description: Holes? In golf? We thought they would be a nice addition to the game so we added about a thousand of them (more or less). Enjoy lots of hole-some new levels that are all about holes.

name: What the Golf? It's Snowtime
description: Complete with snowpals, moose, cars, ice cubes and pizza of course. We even added snow to make it look like golf.

name: Flowers of Starlight
description:
Aster's a simple girl, at her core. All she really wants to do is enjoy her new life at uni, join a club, and spend every possible waking moment playing Magica Fantasia Online (she's not addicted) with her online crush Starsiren.

She's gonna tell her, OK? Just... when they meet up for MagiCon. Honest.

However, a teeny tiny complication arises on her first day at uni, when Aster just so happens to bump into Maristela, the single prettiest girl she's ever seen in her entire life.

And she's not just pretty. Mari's smart, she's funny, and Aster would happily listen to her ramble for hours about whatever the heck she wants to, if only she had a little more courage to do so.

Torn between the friend she's loved forever, and the new girl who it feels like she's always known, Aster faces the toughest decision imaginable, and she's not even been here for a week!

A game about love, new experiences, and the fact that nerdy neurodivergent girls are cute and you should date them.

name: The Winter Games
description: On a cold winter night, the worst members of the naughty list find themselves abducted to the North Pole and forced to play in a series of death games run by a mysterious evil woman claiming to be Santa. Why are they here, and will they survive?

name: A Memorable Time
description: This tiny bitsy game / visual novel tells the story of an experienced queer female sexworker and her last client. It approaches the struggles of queer self discovery, anxiety and confrontation with internalized fears as a result of queerphobic environments.

name: High School Daze: Junior Year
description:
The most stressful year of high school is also the most fun to be had if you can balance classes, extracurriculars, and the oh-so elusive social life.

You’re a high school junior starting the second quarter, who until now has made decent grades, held your own on the girls’ weightlifting team, and been through thick and thin with your supportive best friend, Billie Stevenson.

But maybe it’s time to switch things up and cross a few things off your bucket list? After all, there’s more to life than straight As, and maybe old and new friendships can blossom into something more.

name: High School Daze: Afterschool Stories
description: There's no room for lazy weekend plans when your best friend's family requests your help with their garage sale. But it's not a completely bad time!

name: Exelio
description: In "Exelio," you'll face an ever-changing environment and various threats while acquiring the knowledge and skills needed to survive in uncharted lands. Explore a world where beautiful nature and harsh realities collide, and delve into its mysteries as you carve out your own fate.

name: Useless Demon Lord
description:
Lucille is an unemployed single woman living alone in her apartment, stewing in feelings of anxiety and inadequacy... but then without warning and due to a rather strange magical mix-up, she is summoned to be the new Demon Lord in another world!

The demons aren't doing so well lately, and they're now relying on their new boss to return them to their glory days. Will Lucille be able to take this as an opportunity for a fresh start and thrive even in a world that wants her dead, or will she crumble under the pressure and return to her old shut-in ways?

name: Such, Such Were the Joys
description:
It is the year 19xx in England. You are an Indian university student who attended the boarding school Grayling Towers. You are returning to the town of Grayling after your first year at university to meet your old school friends: Cicily Thomas, Fatima Khan, and Susheela Rajaram. As the only Indian girls at Grayling Towers, the four of you quickly became close friends, but you haven't seen each other in a year. You're not sure what has changed since then, but this is your chance to find out.

"Such, Such Were the Joys" is a queer historical dating sim set in mid-century England, with six possible endings. It is inspired by the English school stories of authors like Enid Blyton and Elinor Brent-Dyer, while trying to acknowledge some of the colonial and racial realities that those stories ignored.

name: Old Gay Cats Look at Old Photos
description: A little Visual Novel about two Old Gay Cats [Named Romeo and Juliet] looking at Old Photos!

name: The Harlem Shake vs. Gangnam Dance Game
description: What's your favorite move: The Harlem Shake or Gangnam Dance? Play as either one in this epic dance game! The biggest YouTube legends ever battling it out.

name: Megurine Luka no Jikenbo
description: Sin descripción

name: Dark Auction: Hitler's Estate
description: The game is a mystery adventure centering on the idea of a historical figure having surreptitiously bequeathed a fictitious estate, following the drama that plays out among the characters faced with an enigma extending all the way into their modern world.

name: Lovely Farm
description: A free online farming simulation game in which players grow fruits and vegetables, plant trees, take care of animals, harvest and sell crops.

name: Fling!
description: Take on increasingly challenging levels by jumping your way through different worlds, dodging disaster and avoiding a multitude of hazards as you utilise your better judgment to accurately fling yourself to the end goal of each level!

name: Long Nardy
description:
Nard refers to both intellectual games and gambling, which allows you to combine "business with pleasure", while giving the player the opportunity to show logic and feel the triumph of victory. In our case, we are talking about the game Long Nardy, since no other game will allow you to get so much adrenaline.
When playing Long Nardy, you will have to "work your head" well, because in order to play Long Nardy, you need ingenuity, tactical thinking, the ability to see the game one move ahead.

name: Prince of Persia: The Forgotten Sands
Need for Speed: Hot Pursuit
description: Feel as a driver to be chased by a racer driving a cool car with tuning or feel the excitement of the stalker! In this new part of the super-race, you can start a career of a street racer and a policeman! Challenge the law behind the wheel of supercars of Pagani Zonda Cinque class or stop the drivers in such high-speed police interceptors as Lamborghini Gallardo LP 560-4 Spyder! Get all the achievements and awards in the saturated with adrenalin 24-hour chases and harassments!

name: The Sims 3
description: Based on the number 1 PC game franchise of all time, The Sims 3 brings exciting new gameplay and endless possibilities all on your mobile phone! Enjoy unexpected moments of surprise and mischief, as you choose whether (or not!) to fulfill your Sims' destinies and make their wishes come true. Create and customize your Sims appearance and personality, then take your Sims out of the house and into the neighborhood with all new open world gameplay. Make their world your own!

name: I Miss When the Internet Was Chronological
description: searching the internet for traces of a long gone tumblr blog. a short bitsy game about holding on to deleted memories, the ephemeral nature of the digital landscape (and tumblr’s golden era).

name: Super Ping Pong
description: Sin descripción

name: Car Combat
description: Announced as a vehicular combat game in the vein of Twisted Metal, the game was one of a few game at the time cancelled during a massive corporate structuring that found much of the company instead focusing on the original Metroid Prime game.

name: Game Zero
description: A game announced announced by Zoonami, a company started by ex-Rare employee Martin Hollis, but never released in any capacity, and the company went out of business in the late 2000s.

name: Iceman
description: The first and only game announced by Datura Studios, was made by past Infogrames employees. Announced as a local multiplayer game for the Gamecube, PS2, original Xbox, and Windows, the game progressed to about 80% completed, but was cancelled when Datura couldn't find a publisher and went out of business.

name: 3D Monster Maze
description: A fan remake of the classic ZX Spectrum game featuring enhanced mazes, items, and full color graphics

name: NFL Retro Football
description: The game designers initially wanted to make a Mario Football game, but Nintendo settled on a realistic simulator with the NFL license due to Retro's purpose of creating mature games. The game was canceled in February 2001.

name: MetaForce
description: The game mostly consisted of concept artwork, design documents, and a mock up engine for a third-person game that was reworked into a first-person game due to pressure from Nintendo and Retro executives. This game was eventually cancelled, but apparently inspired Shigeru Miyamoto to hand Retro the Metroid license, thereby moving the development team to produce Metroid Prime instead.

name: Stage Debut
description: Developed as a follow up to the Japan-only Mario Artist: Talent Studio for the Nintendo 64DD, it involved taking a picture of the player with a Game Boy Advance, transferring it to the Gamecube, and having it mapped over a cartoonish character model's face. The game was never released, but some aspects were reworked into concepts used for the Wii's Mii and Wii Sports years later.

name: Unity
description: Initially announced for the Gamecube in early 2003, the game was cancelled in December 2004. Inability to meet its ambition and scope within a realistic timeframe was cited as a reason by developer Peter Molyneux.

name: Animal Boyfriend
description: Sin descripción

name: Dream Boyfriend: Astral Days
description: Sin descripción

name: Haven: Call of the King
description: Sin descripción

name: Heart of Darkness
description: Sin descripción

name: Abst Clicker Farm
description: Compete with other players in the leaderboard in terms of both total clicks and clicks per second.

name: SnL
description: The essence of the game is very simple and understandable even to younger children.

name: Imemo
description: You assign the number of blocks and create a game field where you need to find paired images.

name: Robo Run
description: Robo Run - This is an adventure game on the speed of reaction.

name: This Picture
description: This picture is a puzzle game of folding parts of the image of the whole picture.

name: Fruit Mess
description: A distinctive feature is the construction of objects not only horizontally or vertically but also diagonally.

name: The Texas Chain Saw Massacre: Chainsaw Skin Variants
description: Show off your twisted personality with these three new skins for Leatherface's chainsaw! Includes the Pristine, Stickers, and Rusty variants. Slaughter with style!

name: Higurashi no Naku Koro ni Tactics
description: Higurashi no Naku Koro ni Tactics was a tactical RPG based on Higurashi When They Cry, developed by Sorayume and released for mobile phones in Japan.
